presets.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this preset?
presets.saveCurrentAsNew: Save current settings as a new preset

color.objectsNotFoundInModels: Objects not found in loaded models

markup.notCreated: Markups not created (template empty or properties missing)
markup.fastenersNotFound: Fasteners with washer count = 0 not found
markup.tooManyObjects: Too many objects ({{count}}). Max {{max}} at once!
markup.tooManyMarkups: Too many markups ({{count}}). Max {{max}} at once!

gpsSearch.title: GPS Location Search
gpsSearch.description: Find and track elements on construction site using GPS
gpsSearch.selectItemsForMarkers: Select items to add markers to
gpsSearch.noGpsPositions: Selected items have no GPS positions
gpsSearch.iframeRestriction: Trimble Connect restricts GPS usage. The tool will open in a separate browser window for location detection.
gpsSearch.browserBlocksGps: Browsers block GPS in iframes for security reasons. A separate window allows GPS to be used.

sections.boltExportDesc: Scan selected elements' bolts and export to Excel file. First select elements with bolts from the model.
sections.boltMarkupsDesc: Add markups to bolts with Bolt Name value. Max {{max}} markups at once.
sections.markerDesc: Color elements by status. Select color and click "Color" button.
sections.markeerijDesc: Create text markups for selected elements. Define up to 3 lines of text template with property values.
sections.stepsMarkerDesc: Select elements from model sequentially and each will automatically get a sequence number markup. Hold CTRL to select multiple elements.
sections.partDatabaseDesc: View all data about a specific part: delivery schedule, arrivals, installations, inspections, etc.

labels.selectModelWithBolts: Select elements with bolts from model
labels.tableMaxRowsWarning: Table displayed for max {{max}} rows. Use "Export Excel" to download.
labels.addFieldsForPreview: Add fields to template to see preview...
labels.dragFieldsOrType: Drag fields here or type text...
labels.selectDetailForProperties: Select a detail from model to see properties
labels.fastenersDesc: Creates markups for sub-element bolts where washer count = 0
labels.dragFieldsHint: Drag fields to lines or click to add. Click × to remove. Max {{max}} markups at once.
labels.colorInfoText: When coloring, the rest of the model turns white and selected category elements get colored. Click category name for quick marking.
labels.markingActive: Marking active - select details from model
labels.stepsHint: Hold CTRL and click elements sequentially. Deselecting removes the markup. To restart, stop and start again.

tooltips.heightInfo: How much higher above the detail the markup text is displayed. Applies when "Auto heights" is not enabled.
tooltips.positionInfo: Determines whether the markup is placed on the left, center or right edge of the detail. Takes into account the current model viewpoint.
tooltips.autoHeightInfo:
When enabled, nearby markups (< 4m apart) automatically get different heights:

• 1st markup: 20 cm
• 2nd markup: 140 cm
• 3rd markup: 280 cm
• etc.

This helps avoid markup overlap.
